title: Pepi Hospital: Learn & Care
description:
Explore kids-friendly Pepi medical centre - become doctor, patient or just a curious explorer!  Create your own stories in a hospital full of action - from the x-ray room to a dentist chair, from a busy pharmacy to an ambulance car.

✨TONS OF ACTION✨

Explore tons of interactive items and help Pepi characters to take care and cure patients. Ambulance will arrive regularly with new patients to take care of, but only the most curious kids will be able to explore all the ways to treat them. This offers an amazing opportunity to set up various scenarios for kids to create their own medical centre stories!

✨FUN & EDUCATIONAL✨

The game encourages the whole family to play and create together, while using educational values of the game! While kids explore all fun opportunities of the medical centre, join them and moderate their experience: help to create different characters stories, explain the nature and use of items such as x-ray or ambulance, expand kids vocabulary and help them to learn basic medical knowledge. 

✨HUNDREDS OF INTERACTIVE OBJECTS✨

Explore hundreds of interactive objects that can be easily transferred through floors. Medical instruments and toys can be given to the doctor or the patient to create the most unique and fun results. Not to mention many opportunities to dress up your favourite characters!

✨COLORFUL AND UNIQUE CHARACTERS✨

Explore dozens of cute, fun and unique characters: humans, pets, monsters, aliens and a little newborn. All of them are waiting for you! Join Pepi characters, explore medical centre, have fun while playing and create your stories.

✨MEET THE PEPI BOT✨

We’re delighted to introduce a medical Pepi Bot - a character built to accompany little players in our game and be a part in your stories. Pepi Bot is a cute, versatile friend able to follow you around the hospital and provide immediate help, to you and your patients. Armed with the latest tech, Pepi Bot is a perfect sidekick to your interactive stories.

✨FEATURES✨
🏥 Explore friendly medical centre packed with tons of items and machines!
🔬Run your own lab - measure blood pressure, perform X-ray scans and much more!
🦷 Get comfy in customisable dentist chair.
🩺 Become a doctor, dentist or nurse and help your patients.
👶🏼 Welcome a newborn. Weight and take a good care of them!
🚑 Ambulance regularly delivers new patients.

summary: Pretend play in Pepi city: become a doctor or a patient. Our city, your stories!
